# Alice's message: Dear Bob,
I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Our product, tailored specifically to meet your unique needs, is priced at $900,000. This investment not only ensures a return on your expenditure but also opens up new opportunities for growth and innovation within your organization.

Considering the intrinsic value and benefits this product offers, I am confident it will be a worthwhile addition to your business. Should you choose to proceed with the purchase, we are prepared to provide comprehensive support throughout the integration process.

Please let me know if you require any further information or have questions about the product. I look forward to the possibility of working together.

Best regards,
Alice 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $900,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $900,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
response:
